title: Drawing, July 1853
medium: Graphite, brush and oxidized white gouache on brown paper
markings:
Recto:  Stamped in ink, at lower left:  Lugt 457c
Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center:  Lugt 457d; again, at right center: 1917-4-88
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at center right:  Palm  Forest in the Quindio Pass / [struck out:  mountains]  From Recollection / - July 53 -
description: Horizontal view of the banks of a narrow valley leading backwards, with palms shown upon the ridges, and a stream in the foreground.  Lateral and high bottom margins.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, July 1853.
July 1853. Graphite, brush and oxidized white gouache on brown paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-88.
